heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, effects, and sacred ritual of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected and receive updates on our upcoming events and valuable content for your spiritual path. We are here to support you on your journey of healing and transformation!
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Please check back later.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
formMediaUrl: Media URL (YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Streamable, or direct .mp4/.webm)
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: The event has been moved to the past events section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from public view but will remain in the system. Are you sure?
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan, you can reserve up to a certain date
guidesPageSubtitle: We are a team dedicated to spiritual accompaniment, trained in the Amazon jungle of Peru. Our mission is to create a safe, respectful, and loving space where you can explore the depths of your being with the guidance of ancestral medicine.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
registerSuccessDescription: Please check your email to verify your account.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew originating from the Amazon. It is prepared by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous cultures have used it in spiritual ceremonies to facilitate deep healing, introspection, and connection with the divine.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. Physically, it acts as a powerful depurative, cleansing the body of toxins. Emotionally and spiritually, it opens the doors to the subconscious, allowing for the release of traumas, fears, and limiting patterns, bringing clarity and a renewed sense of purpose.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a great spiritual master. Each experience is unique and provides what the person needs at that moment in their life. It is a tool for self-knowledge that can reveal deep truths about oneself and the universe, guiding us toward a more authentic and fulfilling existence.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep questions, a new perspective on life, and a clear sense of their purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The process can release deep-rooted emotional traumas and contribute to physical well-being by cleansing the body.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often report a profound sense of connection with themselves, others, nature, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive group environment, where the collective energy enhances the healing process. It is a space to share and grow together.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific needs and intentions.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins weeks before, with a special diet and mental preparation to open the spirit.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred night guided by experienced facilitators, where you connect with the medicine in a safe space.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound inner journey of visions, emotions, and revelations that purifies and transforms.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and apply the teachings received into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: The diet is a fundamental part of the preparation, purifying the body to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like rice, quinoa, and oats
White meats like chicken or fish (unseasoned)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Align your mind and spirit to receive the teachings of the medicine.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and be more receptive.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you seek to heal or understand. What is your purpose?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts and feelings before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is an opportunity to confront and release deep emotions. It is a safe space to cry, laugh, and feel without judgment. Trust the process and allow the medicine to guide you to what needs to be healed. Our team will be by your side to support you at all times.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure a comfortable and focused experience.
comfortItemsList: A change of clothes for the next day
essentialsList: An open heart and a humble spirit
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used by our team to ensure a safe and proper experience for you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the form. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart, blood pressure, liver problems)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, supplements, or regular medication?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychedelics?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Thank you for taking this important step. Your information has been received. Now, we invite you to review the preparation guide to get your body and mind ready for this transformative experience.

backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data by exporting or importing it.
exportDataDescription: Download all critical application data (ceremonies, users, content) into a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite your current data with the content of the file. A backup of the current state will be automatically created before importing, but this action is not easily reversible.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored from the file.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was created just before your last import. If the import caused issues, you can roll back to the previous state.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the database to the state it was in before the last import. This action cannot be undone.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The previous data has been restored.
analyticsDescription: See which sections of your site are most visited by users.
preparationCtaDescription: A complete guide on diet, intention, and essential items for your journey.
